About Me

I'm a front-end developer/software developer based in Heraklion, Greece.

I'm passionate about creating user interfaces (UIs) that are interesting, responsive, and easy to utilize. I cherish the aesthetic of refined illustrations combined with bold graphic elements, clean lines, and stark color contrasts.

I support well-written, documented code with a focus on reusability and adaptability. I'm always ready to learn new technologies, I love to learn, and take on new challenges!
